subject: Football (College)
Sex Crimes
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Penn State could be paying out millions of dollars to victims of Jerry Sandusky after disclosing it had tentative agreements with some of those who say he sexually abused them.
snippet: Penn State could be paying out millions of dollars to victims of Jerry Sandusky after disclosing it had tentative agreements with some of those who say he sexually abused them.
